title: 刚装好Forge打开就崩溃
author: marcong95
txt_content:
装个forge，一打开就崩溃了。。
MC重新下了一个，还是崩溃

环境：
MC 1.7.10（坛子里的纯净包）
Forge 10.13.0.1180（官方Installer装的）
HMCL 2.0.1
Windows 8.1

Crash Log:
*** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.0.1 ***
Restoring disabled mods: mods
Disable inactive mods: mods
Restoring disabled mods: coremods
Disable inactive mods: coremods
*** Invoking minecraft main() ***
2014-08-08 15:24:25,886 ERROR Error processing element Queue: CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2014-08-08 15:24:25,981 ERROR Unable to locate appender ServerGuiConsole for logger com.mojang
2014-08-08 15:24:25,984 ERROR Unable to locate appender ServerGuiConsole for logger 
2014-08-08 15:24:25,986 ERROR Unable to locate appender ServerGuiConsole for logger net.minecraft
Minecraft崩溃了！
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraftlauncher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:167)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/google/common/collect/Lists
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.acceptOptions(FMLTweaker.java:50)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:113)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
        ... 5 more
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.google.common.collect.Lists
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        ... 8 more复制代码

求大神指教。。。。就玩个MC，为啥就这么烦呢~~

replies.author: jhaiyan01
replies.txt_content: 你到籽岷那里（优酷）找1.7.10的模组介绍，进贴吧，那里会有辉煌的整合包（是BMCL），把所有的mod全删掉。

replies.author: marcong95
replies.txt_content:
jhaiyan01 发表于 2014-8-8 16:35
你到籽岷那里（优酷）找1.7.10的模组介绍，进贴吧，那里会有辉煌的整合包（是BMCL），把所有的mod全删掉。 ...
我不怎么想用整合包之类的，因为我有可能会在linux下玩~
